name: PROJECTION (rakan)
description:
PROJECTION is a 2,5D action game which mixes puzzle and platforming. 

As a guinea pig in a laboratory to be a crash test for five experiences (levels) on the shadows, you can control your shadow to interact with specific objects like buttons, levers and boxes to access the next test room. But pay attention to the environment, because your body and your shadow don't have the same properties and weaknesses...

Developped during my first year at school, PROJECTION has been made in 40 days by the Team Jello, composed of 5 game designers and 3 game programmers.
